00024 ##User-Employee. This method aunthenticates employee username and password. Authentication is successful if username and password are correct,else: display the error message
00025 ##@param request HttpRequest, the request created by user
00026 ##@return HTTPResponse Object,containing the name of the template which is to be rendered,and its context,which contains all the local variables of this function if authentication is successful,else: display error message
00027 def employeeLogin(request):
00028         if request.method == 'POST':
00029                 form = EmployeeLoginForm(request.POST)
00030                 form1 = SearchAccountNumberForm();
00031                 if form.is_valid():
00032                         employee_id = form.cleaned_data['employee_id']
00033                         password = form.cleaned_data['password']
00034                         global e_id
00035                         n=0
00036                         empId=employee_id
00037                         passw=password
00038                         for num in Employee.objects.all():
00039                                 emp_id=num.employee_id
00040                                 passwrd=num.password
00041                                 if empId==emp_id and passw==passwrd:
00042                                         n=empId
00043                                         e_id=n
00044                                         break
00045                         if n==0:
00046                                 return render_to_response('cheques/employeeLogin.html', {
00047                                         'form': form,
00048                                         'error_message': "Invalid ID or Password",
00049                                 }, context_instance=RequestContext(request))    
00050                         else:
00051                                 return render_to_response('cheques/e_searchAccount.html', {'form': form1
00052                                 },  context_instance=RequestContext(request))
00053         else:
00054                 form=EmployeeLoginForm()
00055         return render_to_response('cheques/employeeLogin.html', {
00056                 'form': form                    
00057     }, context_instance=RequestContext(request))

00060 ## User-Employee. This method searches the Account table in the database for the account number.
00061 ##@param request HttpRequest, the request created by user
00062 ##@return HTTPResponse Object,containing the name of the template which is to be rendered,and its context,which contains all the local variables of this function if search is successful, else: display error message
00063 def e_searchAccount(request):
00064         if request.method == 'POST':
00065                 form = SearchAccountNumberForm(request.POST)
00066                 if form.is_valid():
00067                         account_number = form.cleaned_data['account_number']
00068                         global accn
00069                         n=0
00070                         accNum=account_number
00071                         for num in Account.objects.all():
00072                                 a_num=num.account_number
00073                                 if accNum==a_num:
00074                                         n=accNum
00075                                         accn=n
00076                                         break
00077                         if n==0:
00078                                 return render_to_response('cheques/e_searchAccount.html', {
00079                                         'form': form,
00080                                         'error_message': "Invalid Account Number",
00081                                 }, context_instance=RequestContext(request))    
00082                         else:
00083                                 return render_to_response('cheques/employeeMenu.html', {'acc_nu': account_number})
00084         else:
00085                 form=SearchAccountNumberForm()
00086         return render_to_response('cheques/e_searchAccount.html', {
00087                 'form': form                    
00088         }, context_instance=RequestContext(request))

00098 ##User-Employee. This method issues a cheque book of selected size
00099 ##@param request HttpRequest, the request created by user
00100 ##@return HTTPResponse Object,containing the name of the template which is to be rendered,and its context,which contains all the local variables of this function       
00101 def e_issueChequeBook(request):
00102         global accn
00103         accn_r = request.GET.get('account_number','')
00104         if accn_r==None:
00105                 accn_r=accn
00106         for num in Account.objects.all():
00107                 a_num=num.account_number
00108                 if accn_r==a_num:
00109                         name=num.name
00110                         balance=num.balance
00111                         acc_id=num.id
00112                         num_ch_books=num.number_of_chequebooks
00113         if request.method == 'POST':
00114                 form = IssueChequeBookForm(request.POST)
00115                 if form.is_valid():
00116                         size=form.cleaned_data['size']
00117                         issueDate=form.cleaned_data['issueDate']
00118                         today_date=issueDate
00119                         if num_ch_books==0:
00120                                 first_ch_num=100000
00121                                 ch_book=ChequeBook(account_number_id=acc_id, size=int(size), issue_date=today_date, first_cheque_number=first_ch_num)
00122                                 ch_book.save()
00123                         else:
00124                                 fch=0
00125                                 fnum=ChequeBook.objects.get(account_number=acc_id)
00126                                 fch=fnum.first_cheque_number
00127                                 first_ch_num=fch+int(size)
00128                                 ChequeBook.objects.filter(account_number=acc_id).update(account_number=acc_id, 
00129                                                         size=size, issue_date=today_date, first_cheque_number=first_ch_num)
00130                         num_ch_books=num_ch_books+1
00131                         Account.objects.filter(account_number=accn_r).update(number_of_chequebooks=num_ch_books)
00132                         message="Cheque Book Issued"
00133                         return render_to_response('cheques/employeeMenu.html', {'message': message, 'acc_nu': accn})
00134         else:
00135                 form=IssueChequeBookForm()
00136         return render_to_response('cheques/e_issueChequeBook.html', {
00137                 'name': name,
00138                 'balance': balance,
00139                 'acc_nu': accn_r,
00140                 'form': form                    
00141     }, context_instance=RequestContext(request))

00146 ## User-Employee.This method deducts the amount from drawee's account, if cheque number,cheque date and amount entered in the cheque payment form are valid, else: displays the corresponding error message
00147 ##@param request HttpRequest, the request created by user
00148 ##@return HTTPResponse Object,containing the name of the template which is to be rendered,and its context,which contains all the local variables of this function if cheque payment is successful,else: display error message
00149 def e_chequePayment(request):
00150         global accn
00151         accn_r = request.GET.get('account_number','')
00152         if accn_r==None:
00153                 accn_r=accn
00154         
00155         if request.method == 'POST': 
00156                 form = ChequePaymentForm(request.POST) 
00157                 if form.is_valid():
00158                         global accn
00159                         cheque_number = form.cleaned_data['cheque_number']
00160                         amount = form.cleaned_data['amount']
00161                         cheque_date = form.cleaned_data['cheque_date']
00162                         payee_name = form.cleaned_data['payee_name']
00163                         today_date=datetime.date.today()
00164                         date = today_date-cheque_date   
00165                         date=date.days
00166                         acc_id=0
00167                         for num in Account.objects.all():
00168                                 a_num=num.account_number
00169                                 if accn_r==a_num:
00170                                         name=num.name
00171                                         balance=num.balance
00172                                         acc_id=num.id
00173                         
00174                         m=0
00175                         for cn in Cheque.objects.all():
00176                                 a_cn=cn.cheque_number
00177                                 if int(cheque_number)==int(a_cn):
00178                                         m=1
00179                         sform=SearchAccountNumberForm()
00180                         cb=ChequeBook.objects.get(account_number=acc_id)                
00181                         cnum=cb.first_cheque_number
00182                         csize=cb.size + cnum
00183                         
00184                         if m==1 or int(cheque_number) < cnum or int(cheque_number) > csize:
00185                                 return render_to_response('cheques/e_chequePayment.html', {
00186                                         'name': name,
00187                                         'balance': balance,
00188                                         'form': form,
00189                                         'acc_nu': accn_r,
00190                                         'message': "Invalid cheque number",
00191                                         'm': m
00192                                 }, context_instance=RequestContext(request))
00193                         elif balance<amount:
00194                                 ch_info=Cheque(cheque_number=cheque_number, date=cheque_date, amount=amount,
00195                                                         payee_name=payee_name, micr_number='500002023', account_number_id=acc_id, status='bounced')
00196                                 message="Cheque bounced due to insufficient balance"
00197                                 ch_info.save()  
00198                                 return render_to_response('cheques/employeeMenu.html', {
00199                                         'message': message,
00200                                         'form': sform
00201                                 }, context_instance=RequestContext(request))
00202                         elif date>183:
00203                                 ch_info=Cheque(cheque_number=cheque_number, date=cheque_date, amount=amount,
00204                                                         payee_name=payee_name, micr_number='500002023', account_number_id=acc_id, status='bounced')
00205                                 message="Cheque bounced due to expired date"
00206                                 ch_info.save()  
00207                                 return render_to_response('cheques/employeeMenu.html', {
00208                                         'message': message,
00209                                         'form': sform
00210                                 }, context_instance=RequestContext(request))
00211                         else:
00212                                 balance=balance-amount
00213                                 Account.objects.filter(account_number=accn_r).update(balance=balance)
00214                                 ch_info=Cheque(cheque_number=cheque_number, date=cheque_date, amount=amount,
00215                                                         payee_name=payee_name, micr_number='500002023', account_number_id=acc_id, status='processed')
00216                                 message="Cheque processed successfully" 
00217                                 ch_info.save()          
00218                                 return render_to_response('cheques/employeeMenu.html', {
00219                                         'message': message,
00220                                         'form': sform
00221                                 }, context_instance=RequestContext(request))
00222                         
00223         else:
00224                 form=ChequePaymentForm()
00225 
00226         for num in Account.objects.all():
00227                 a_num=num.account_number
00228                 if accn==a_num:
00229                         name=num.name
00230                         balance=num.balance
00231                                 
00232         return render_to_response('cheques/e_chequePayment.html', {
00233                 'name': name,
00234                 'balance': balance,
00235                 'form': form,
00236                 'acc_nu': accn_r
00237         }, context_instance=RequestContext(request))

00240 ##User-Employee. This method cancels the cheque if cheque number is valid,else: display the corresponding error message
00241 ##@param request HttpRequest, the request created by user

00243 
00244 def e_chequeCancellation(request):
00245         global accn
00246         accn_r = request.GET.get('account_number','')
00247         if accn_r==None:
00248                 accn_r=accn
00249         if request.method == 'POST':
00250                 form = ChequeCancellationForm(request.POST)
00251                 if form.is_valid():
00252                         cheque_number = form.cleaned_data['cheque_number']
00253                         global accn
00254                         n=1
00255                         acc_id=0
00256                         for num in Account.objects.all():
00257                                 a_num=num.account_number
00258                                 if accn_r==a_num:
00259                                         acc_id=num.id
00260                                         name=num.name
00261                         for num in Cheque.objects.all():
00262                                 ac_id=num.account_number_id
00263                                 c_num=num.cheque_number
00264                                 if int(cheque_number)==int(c_num) and int(acc_id)==int(ac_id):
00265                                         status=num.status
00266                                         n=cheque_number
00267                                         break   
00268                         m=0
00269                         for cn in Cheque.objects.all():
00270                                 a_cn=cn.cheque_number
00271                                 if int(cheque_number)==int(a_cn):
00272                                         m=1
00273                         cb=ChequeBook.objects.get(account_number=acc_id)                
00274                         cnum=cb.first_cheque_number
00275                         csize=cb.size + cnum
00276                         cheque_date=datetime.date.today()
00277                         if n!=1:
00278                                 return render_to_response('cheques/employeeMenu.html', {
00279                                         'messagee': status,
00280                                         'acc_nu': accn,
00281                                         'messa': 1
00282                                 }, context_instance=RequestContext(request))
00283                         elif m==1 or int(cheque_number) < cnum or int(cheque_number) > csize:
00284                                 return render_to_response('cheques/e_chequeCancellation.html', {
00285                                         'form': form,
00286                                         'name': name,
00287                                         'acc_nu': accn_r, 
00288                                         'message': "Invalid Cheque number",
00289                                 }, context_instance=RequestContext(request))
00290                         else:
00291                                 ch_info=Cheque(cheque_number=cheque_number, date=cheque_date, amount='000',
00292                                                         micr_number='500002023', account_number_id=acc_id, status='cancelled')
00293                                 ch_info.save()
00294                                 return render_to_response('cheques/employeeMenu.html', {
00295                                         'message': "Cheque has been cancelled",
00296                                 }, context_instance=RequestContext(request))
00297                         
00298                                         
00299         else:
00300                 form=ChequeCancellationForm()
00301 
00302         for num in Account.objects.all():
00303                 a_num=num.account_number
00304                 if accn_r==a_num:
00305                         name=num.name
00306         return render_to_response('cheques/e_chequeCancellation.html', {
00307                                 
00308                 'name': name,
00309                 'acc_nu': accn_r, 
00310                 'form': form,
00311                 }, context_instance=RequestContext(request))

00376 ##User-Customer.This method aunthenticates customer username and password. Authentication is successful if username and password are correct,else: display the error message
00377 ##@param request HttpRequest, the request created by user
00378 ##@return HTTPResponse Object,containing the name of the template which is to be rendered,and its context,which contains all the local variables of this function if authentication is successful,else: display error message
00379 
00380 def customerLogin(request):
00381         if request.method == 'POST':
00382                 form = CustomerLoginForm(request.POST)
00383                 if form.is_valid():
00384                         username = form.cleaned_data['username']
00385                         password = form.cleaned_data['password']
00386                         global accn
00387                         n=0
00388                         for num in Customer.objects.all():
00389                                 user=num.username
00390                                 passwrd=num.password
00391                                 if username==user and password==passwrd:
00392                                         n=num.account_number
00393                                         break
00394                         accn = n
00395                         if n==0:
00396                                 return render_to_response('cheques/customerLogin.html', {
00397                                         'form': form,
00398                                         'error_message': "Invalid username or password",
00399                                 }, context_instance=RequestContext(request))    
00400                         else:
00401                                 acc_n=Account.objects.get(account_number=n)             
00402                                 name=acc_n.name
00403                                 return render_to_response('cheques/customerMenu.html', {'name': name})
00404         else:
00405                 form=CustomerLoginForm()
00406         return render_to_response('cheques/customerLogin.html', {
00407                 'form': form                    
00408     }, context_instance=RequestContext(request))

00489 def c_chequeStatus(request):

00528         else:
00529                 form=ChequeStatusForm()
00530         return render_to_response('cheques/c_chequeStatus.html', {
00531                 'form': form                    
00532     }, context_instance=RequestContext(request))
00533

00535 ##User-Customer. This method sets all global variables to zero and displays the login page
00536 ##@param request HttpRequest, the request created by user
00537 ##@return HTTPResponse Object,containing the name of the template which is to be rendered,and its context,which contains all the local variables of this function
00538 
00539 def logoutCustomer(request):
00540         global accn
00541         accn=0
00542         return render_to_response('cheques/login.html')
